Detailed Description

Class gathering access to connected hardware.

HWAccess manages every connected hardware and acquires data form master and slaves. It is also responsible for synchronisation between connected devices. It can hold multiple types of hardware objects, derived from HWThread, whereby only ONE master is allowed coincident.

Member Function Documentation

DataPacket HWAccess::getDataPacket (  ) 

Retreive a DataPacket containing data from attached hardware synchronous with the master device.

Returns:
packet A DataPacket containing data from all connected hardware objects (master) and slaves). Master

Signals a ascending ordered dependent on their SignalType (EEG, EMG,...). SampleNr is automatically increased. DataPacket (holded by hw_access object) is reseted all the time this method is called.
